autocut.command.autocut.finish.fail.noRe: No record found. Did you connect, start record, and stop record?
autocut.cutting.fail: Something went wrong while preparing to export. Check your logs for more info.
autocut.cutting.progress.fail: Something went wrong while exporting. Check your logs for more info.
autocut.record.connect.alreadyRecording: Warning: You started recording before connecting Autocut. Autocut will not record until you restart recording.
autocut.record.end.fail.notStarted: Warning: Recording was not started in autocut - no record is saved.
autocut.record.end.fail.sqlException: Failed to save metadata for record (SQLException)
autocut.yacl.attack_entity_clip.descript: When you attempt to attack an entity, including a player.
autocut.yacl.break_block_clip.descriptio: When you break a block. This happens at the end, so it's not guaranteed that the whole breaking time will be included.
autocut.yacl.category.clips.tooltip: Configure how sections of video are saved. Note that these settings only apply for future clips.
autocut.yacl.category.export.tooltip: Configure the format videos are exported in
autocut.yacl.export.existingFiles.descri: Defines what happens when trying to export something with the same name as an already existing file.
autocut.yacl.export.fileFormat.descripti:
The name of the file to export to, not including the extension (like ".mp4").
It's recommended to include variables (see below), otherwise you'll start overwriting your videos.
{ORIGINAL} will be replaced with the file name of the record
{CLIPS} will be replaced with the number of clips.
Backslashes (\) and periods (.) will be ignored.
autocut.yacl.export.format.description: The video format to export to, eg "mp4", "mkv"
autocut.yacl.generic.active.description: Whether this event should be exported in the final record.
autocut.yacl.generic.end_offset.descript: How many milliseconds after the event should be counted as part of the clip.
autocut.yacl.generic.grouping_mode.descr: What clips this group should be exported with.
autocut.yacl.generic.inverse.description: If new clips should be the opposite of clips - the footage they cover will NOT be exported.
autocut.yacl.generic.should_record.descr: Whether this event should be recorded.
autocut.yacl.generic.start_offset.descri: How many milliseconds before the event should be counted as part of the clip.
autocut.yacl.manual_clip.description:
When you press the keybind.
Default: %s
Current: %s
autocut.yacl.not_in_world.description: When you're in a world, or paused in single player.
autocut.yacl.receive_player_message_clip: When you receive a chat message from a player. This may be a direct message or a regular one. This may be triggered as a system message on some servers.
autocut.yacl.receive_server_message_clip: When you receive a chat message from the server or part of the game. Player messages may trigger this on some servers.
autocut.yacl.shoot_player_clip.descripti: When you shoot a player. Note that some servers will "fake" this in order to play the sound that comes with it. On Hypixel, you'll notice this when you join a game. You can filter these out if you like - it seems to only happen when you're at x=8.5, z=8.5.
autocut.yacl.take_damage_clip.damage_pre: How many decimal points of precision to record damage at.
autocut.yacl.take_damage_clip.descriptio: Whenever you take damage from any source.
autocut.yacl.title: Autocut configuration menu
autocut.yacl.use_item_clip.description: When you use (right-click with) an item. This happens at the beginning of the click, and so it is not guaranteed to include the whole click if the button is held.
